Objective: Verify the ways to navigate to Site Map from footer link
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps: 1) Click the Site Map in footer under Customer Services label
Expected Result: The user should be navigated to site map page

Objective: Verify breadcrumb of Site Map
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps: 1) Click the Site Map in footer under Customer Services label
Expected Result: The Breadcrumb should be displayed and working

Objective: Verify navigating to Category pages from Site Map
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click the Site Map in footer under Customer Services label
2) Click a category in the Site map listing
3) Repeat step 2 for all categories
Expected Result: The User should be taken to selected Category page

Objective: Verify navigating to Subcategory pages from Site Map
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click the Site Map in footer under Customer Services label
2) Click a subcategory in the Site map listing
3) Repeat step 2 for all Subcategories
Expected Result: The User should be taken to selected Subcategory page

Objective: Verify the Site Map Page functionality in all the supported environments
